TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed LegendImageStyle extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the style to apply to the symbol for a legend item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The LegendImageStyle enumeration represents the style that is used for a legend item, and is applied to the symbol for that item.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle Line = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The symbol will be a line.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle Marker = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The symbol will be a marker.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle Rectangle = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The symbol will be a rectangle.
